nodes.text: Logray's instrument was a magic flute that belonged to the Ewok Logray, shaman of the Bright Tree Village. It had the power to emit vibrations that could be picked up by another flute, allowing the flutists to locate each other. The Ewok warriors Wicket Warrick, Teebo and Paploo once used Logray's instrument to find their friend Latara when she went missing.
Logray's instrument appeared in To Trap Latara, a Spanish story of ambiguous canonicity that was published in 1986 under the MyComyc label.
